name: Ninja Twinz
description:
Your mission is easy. Stay alive by jumping over your enemies.
It's not as easy as it looks. Download and give it a try!

You play the part of Ninja and his twin brother. Tap on the screen to make them jump. The game gets harder and harder the longer you stay alive.

• Easy tap controls
• Awesome sound effects
• Uses Game Center for leaderboards

Challenge your friends to beat your score!

Download now. (It's free!)
